name: Bloomery
purpose: Smelt low-grade ores and resins
notes: Emits low smoke when using EQP-005

name: Fletcher's Bench
purpose: Craft fletched weapons and ammo
notes: Installed near STR-003 to share tools

name: Blacksmith's Anvil
purpose: Shape metal components
notes: Durable surface; counts as heavy tool

name: Herbalist's Table
purpose: Mix poultices and medicines
notes: Built with waterproofed planks

name: Arcane Lathe
purpose: Cut/set crystals with precision
notes: Requires stable mana flow; keep near grounding rods

name: Clay Settling Pit
purpose: Soak and decant river clay to workable slip
notes: Lined with straw; drain slake water away from camp

name: Earthen Clamp Kiln
purpose: Slow-fire bricks and pottery batches
notes: Needs steady tending to avoid black core bricks

name: Drying Rack Shed
purpose: Air-dry green bricks and pottery under cover
notes: Raise off ground to deter warping

name: Side-Draft Bloomery
purpose: Roast bog copper nodules into workable blooms
notes: Bellows tucked low; slag tap trench

name: Crucible Forge
purpose: Alloy bronze and refine meteoric blooms
notes: Hooded vents keep smoke out of camp

name: Retting Vat
purpose: Soak and weight fibre bundles for softening
notes: Keep shaded; drain slake water downhill

name: Flax Break & Scutch Rack
purpose: Crack stalks and scrape fibres clean
notes: Sweep splinters after each batch

name: Spindle Bench
purpose: Seat and tool rest for hand spinning
notes: Peg slots hold extra spindles

name: Upright Loom
purpose: Tension yarns and weave bolts
notes: Needs dry corner to avoid warp

name: Tanning Vat
purpose: Scrape hides and circulate tanning liquor
notes: Keep paddles handy to agitate

name: Ropewalk Stakes
purpose: Stretch fibre lines for twist and lay
notes: Set straight on firm ground; anchor stakes deep

name: Stonecutters Shed
purpose: Dress stone blocks and mix mortar under cover
notes: Keep chisels sharp; sweep slurry often

name: Charcoal Clamp
purpose: Mound and smolder log stacks for fuel
notes: Vent slowly; post watch to break flare-ups

name: Irrigation Ditch Network
purpose: Guide water through crops; prevent washouts
notes: Dig along contour; line seepage spots

name: Clay Pit & Quarry Face
purpose: Exposes and benches clay faces for bulk digging
notes: Sump and tarp spoil piles; pump out after storms; pair with JOB-002 stonecutters and JOB-011 loggers for corduroy walkways as in survival builders

name: Clay Drying Racks
purpose: Slatted racks for stiffening bricks and tiles
notes: Keep under lean-to; rotate shelves to avoid warping; stack with rope lashings to mimic medieval yard drying in city-builders

name: Pottery Kick Wheel
purpose: Foot-powered wheel for throwing vessels
notes: Shelter from rain; leather strap pedal improves cadence; ballast with river stones like rustic workshop sims

name: Primitive Clamp Kiln
purpose: Covered pit clamp for first glaze burns
notes: Needs slow preheat; pack turf blanket to hold heat; thrives on mixed brush, straw, and charcoal fines familiar to frontier colony games

name: Updraft Draft Kiln
purpose: Vented brick updraft kiln for efficient firings
notes: Chimney guard keeps rain out; baffles improve fuel use; accepts charcoal or peat bricks and benefits from JOB-034 kiln minders for even draws

name: Ore Sorting Sluice & Roast Bed
purpose: Wash and grade ore nodules before bloom charging
notes: Set plank roofs over sluice lanes; low-heat roast drives off damp like mining camps in builder sims; keep tailings piles bermed

name: Finery Forge & Quench Bay
purpose: Refine pig iron blooms and temper tool stock
notes: Needs steady blast and slag taps; cover quench troughs from grit; pair with JOB-013 forgewrights to stretch charcoal loads

name: Fulling Troughs & Dyer's Hearth
purpose: Scour, full, and dye cloth bolts
notes: Keep under canopy to control steam; treadle stocks mimic medieval fulling mills; rinse downhill from hearth to keep dyes even

name: Timber Seasoning Shed
purpose: Stack and sticker logs and planks for drying
notes: South-facing vents bleed moisture; raised racks keep beetles off like sawyer camps in survival builders

name: Wheelwright's Frame & Spoke Pit
purpose: Jig wheels, hubs, and carts with trued spokes
notes: Keep undercover for glue cures; chalk circles help true rims before banding; shares crews with JOB-012 carpenters

name: Powder Mixing Bench
purpose: Ventilated bench for grinding, dampening, and screening black powder
notes: Grounded rods and copper tools cut static risk; isolate from forges

name: Guild Desk & Press Bench
purpose: Script copying, ledger stamping, and screw-press runs
notes: Clamp galleys tight; keep ink stones covered

name: Press Room & Type Racks
purpose: Houses screw press, type racks, and drying lines
notes: Needs dust-free canopy; anchors EQP-039 cases and STR-074 benches for high-volume runs

name: Lift-Gas Generator Shed
purpose: Boils resin or charcoal reagents to fill EQP-042 envelopes
notes: Vent downwind; pair with EQP-043 crews to keep bladder temps in check

name: Mooring Mast & Winch Deck
purpose: Anchors tethered balloons and winch crews
notes: Requires clear approach; keep EQP-043 kit staged and tie-in to INV-002 rope stores

name: Forager's Hut
purpose: Gathers wild herbs, berries, and mushrooms with basic shelter
notes: Low smoke fire ring; relies on nearby forage nodes

name: Basketry Rack
purpose: Improves carry baskets and staging for gathered goods
notes: Tight weave keeps small forage from spilling

name: Herb Drying Loft
purpose: Adds lofted racks for drying herbs and mushrooms
notes: Keeps damp off sensitive herbs; slow airflow

name: Smoke Pit (small)
purpose: Small pit kiln for light smoking of forage
notes: Boosts preservation but needs tending

name: Herbalist's Hut
purpose: Sheltered apothecary bay for tinctures and poultices
notes: Keeps ingredients dry; pairs with Forager's Hut

name: Distillation Coil
purpose: Copper coil and cooling basin for simple distillations
notes: Adds gentle heat gradients for oils and spirits

name: Reagent Shelves
purpose: Tiered shelving to sort reagents and sealed jars
notes: Faster staging and safer handling for delicate reagents

name: Trapper's Hut
purpose: Fields trap lines and dresses small game returns
notes: Raised deck keeps bait dry; hides can hang

name: Hunting Lodge
purpose: Larger lodge for shared trapper crews and smoking racks
notes: Adds bunks and smoke vents for larger batches

name: Skinning Frame
purpose: Framed beam for stretching and scraping hides
notes: Reduces spoilage; frees floor space

name: Trap Lines Cache
purpose: Cache for pre-baited traps and snares
notes: Faster resets on long lines; protects bait

name: Trophy Racks
purpose: Display and drying racks for pelts and horns
notes: Improves morale, keeps pests off trophies

name: Fishing Shack
purpose: Basic riverside shack for line and net fishing
notes: Keep near slow water; sheltered cutting block

name: Net Drying Racks
purpose: Racks to dry and mend fishing nets
notes: Prevents rot and keeps knots tight

name: Smokehouse Extension
purpose: Covered smoke chamber for fish preservation
notes: Extends shelf life; needs steady tending

name: Boat Slip
purpose: Small slip for riverboats and skiffs
notes: Faster launch and haul-out for boats

name: Fishing Wharf
purpose: Piled wharf with stalls for multiple crews
notes: Supports small cranes and salting tables

name: Fishery Complex
purpose: Consolidated fishery with chilling pits and smoke bays
notes: Integrates slips, smoke bays, and salting cellars

name: Rabbit Warren
purpose: Managed burrows for small game meat and pelts
notes: Needs routine cleaning to prevent disease

name: Managed Warren
purpose: Enlarged warrens with feeding runs and cleaning grates
notes: Better airflow reduces losses

name: Breeding Pens
purpose: Segregated pens for selective breeding and quarantine
notes: Stabilizes output quality but needs upkeep

name: Farm Plot (small)
purpose: Small rotated plots for staple crops
notes: Simple ditches and seedbeds

name: Farmstead
purpose: Centralized sheds, granaries, and fields
notes: Adds staging barn and shared tools

name: Manor Farm
purpose: Estate-scale farm with multiple rotations and storage
notes: Overseer ledgering and drainage supports

name: Irrigation Channels
purpose: Dug channels and gates for better watering
notes: Reduces drought risk, can flood if untended

name: Crop Rotation Markers
purpose: Marker stones and logs to guide rotations
notes: Keeps soil fertile and reduces pests

name: Tool Shed
purpose: Weatherproof shed for hoes, plows, and seed drills
notes: Protects tools and speeds field setup

name: Barn Expansion
purpose: Extra bays for hay, beasts, and wagons
notes: Supports winter fodder and larger teams

name: Orchard
purpose: Tree rows for fruit and nut production
notes: Needs pruning and pest watch

name: Vineyard
purpose: Trellised vines for grapes and specialty fruit
notes: Requires steady pruning and drainage

name: Press Shed
purpose: Shed with small press for cider or wine
notes: Improves juice yields and storage

name: Trellis Upgrade
purpose: Extra trellising and pruning rails
notes: Keeps vines airy and resistant to rot

name: Pasture (small)
purpose: Small grazing lot with simple fencing
notes: Rotational pasture for few animals

name: Pasture (medium)
purpose: Expanded grazing with water troughs
notes: Supports more headcount and fodder

name: Pasture (large)
purpose: Broad pasture with lane fencing and wells
notes: Allows wagon access and herd rotation

name: Fencing Upgrade
purpose: Reinforced fencing and gates
notes: Reduces escapes and predator losses

name: Shelter Sheds
purpose: Simple sheds to shield animals
notes: Cuts weather losses, improves health

name: Selective Breeding Pens
purpose: Pens for bloodline control and feed trials
notes: Raises quality at cost of upkeep

name: Stable
purpose: Houses mounts with tack storage and grooming bay
notes: Needs fodder stock and drainage

name: Kennels
purpose: Housing for hounds and working dogs
notes: Secure runs with cleaning drains

name: Poultry Yard
purpose: Coops and scratching yard for fowl and eggs
notes: Guard from foxes; provide grit and feed

name: Cellar
purpose: Cool underground storage for mixed foods
notes: Damp-resistant shelving; watch for mold

name: Cold Cellar
purpose: Ice-assisted cellar for perishables
notes: Needs ice deliveries or cooling runes

name: Granary
purpose: Ventilated grain store with raised floors
notes: Reduces spoilage; keep swept

name: Silo
purpose: Tall bin for bulk grain with chutes
notes: High capacity but needs careful loading

name: Storehouse
purpose: General goods store for mixed wares
notes: Track inventories to avoid loss

name: Warehouse
purpose: Large-scale covered storage with bays
notes: Requires stevedores and ledgers

name: Trade Vault
purpose: Secured vault for coin, contracts, and valuables
notes: Guarded entry and heavy locks

name: Shelving Systems
purpose: Modular shelves and bins to improve density
notes: Safer stacking and faster retrieval

name: Pest Control
purpose: Traps, cats, and sealing to deter pests
notes: Reduces spoilage risk

name: Inventory Ledgers
purpose: Ledger station and slates for counts
notes: Cuts loss and improves throughput

name: Magical Preservation Runes
purpose: Rune set for cooling and warding spoilage
notes: Consumes mana upkeep; steady temperature

name: Smithy
purpose: Covered forge with anvil, quench, and prep benches
notes: Core metalworking space distinct from bloomery

name: Enlarged Furnace
purpose: Larger hearth box for hotter charges
notes: Better heat retention but more fuel hungry

name: Manual Bellows
purpose: Single bellows for steadier airflow
notes: Allows longer heats with less fatigue

name: Dual Bellows System
purpose: Twin bellows with foot treadles
notes: Higher blast for larger heats

name: Tool Racks & Jigs
purpose: Pegs, racks, and jigs for rapid tool swaps
notes: Faster throughput and consistent shapes

name: Expanded Workbenches
purpose: Added benches and fixtures for assistants
notes: Supports more helpers and layouts

name: Weaponsmithing Workshop Module
purpose: Specialized tooling for weapons and edges
notes: Exclusive focus for blades and points

name: Armorsmithing Workshop Module
purpose: Stakes, forms, and hammers for armor
notes: Exclusive focus for plates, scales, and links

name: Toolmaker's Bench Module
purpose: Benches for dies, clamps, and precision tooling
notes: Exclusive focus for tools and jigs

name: Jeweler's Workshop
purpose: Bench for fine metal and gem work
notes: Needs bright light and steady stools

name: Gemcutting Station
purpose: Rig for precise gem shaping, can pair with STR-005
notes: Dampened vibration bed improves yields

name: Precision Loupe Kit
purpose: Adjustable lenses for inspection
notes: Raises accuracy on cuts and inlays

name: Gold/Silver Casting Tray
purpose: Small crucible and tray for soft metal pours
notes: Adds casting options for fine metals

name: Setting Jig
purpose: Micro-vices and clamps for stone setting
notes: Prevents slips when setting gems

name: Enchantment Socketing Block
purpose: Stabilized block for rune socketing and binding
notes: Supports arcane bindings without cracking

name: Dock
purpose: Simple dock for loading skiffs and barges
notes: Ties into quay roads and rope posts

name: Harbor
purpose: Reinforced harbor with quays, customs post, and mooring
notes: Handles multiple vessels and cargo

name: Port Authority
purpose: Offices, barracks, and ledgers for harbor oversight
notes: Regulates tolls, manifests, and security

name: Boatyard
purpose: Yard for hull repairs and small craft builds
notes: Needs tar kettles and sawpits nearby

name: Shipyard
purpose: Large slipways and sheds for major hulls
notes: Supports mast stepping and caulking bays

name: Lighthouse
purpose: Beacon tower for navigation and hazard warnings
notes: Needs fuel deliveries and optics upkeep

name: Net Loft
purpose: Loft for drying sailcloth and netting out of spray
notes: Keeps rigging serviceable; supports lofting

name: Sailmaker's Loft
purpose: Dedicated sail and rigging loft with cutting floors
notes: Improves sail throughput and repair quality

name: Port Crane & Hoist
purpose: Crane and hoist system for bays and warehouses
notes: Speeds loading and unloading; needs crew

name: Hovel
purpose: Rudimentary shelter for small families
notes: Smoky firepit; low comfort

name: Cottage
purpose: Simple timber cottage with hearth and loft
notes: Dry loft storage and better warmth

name: Townhouse
purpose: Multi-room townhouse for urban blocks
notes: Shared walls reduce heat loss

name: Manor House
purpose: High-quality manor with service rooms
notes: Includes study and cellar access

name: Estate
purpose: Estate complex with hall, wings, and gardens
notes: Servant quarters and ledgered upkeep

name: Insulation/Weatherproofing
purpose: Chinking, shutters, and weatherproof coats
notes: Improves warmth and durability

name: Hearth & Chimney
purpose: Proper hearth, chimney, and flue
notes: Safer fires and better comfort

name: Additional Room Wing
purpose: Extra room or loft wing for occupants
notes: Raises capacity with modest upkeep

name: Sanitation Latrine
purpose: Lined pit or chute with cover and wash
notes: Cuts disease risk; needs cleaning

name: Garden Plot
purpose: Small garden for herbs and morale
notes: Provides fresh garnish and rest spot

name: Fire Watch Post
purpose: Elevated post with alarm bell and buckets
notes: Early warning against fires

name: Fire Bell Tower
purpose: Stone bell tower and lookout
notes: Wider alarm coverage and water staging

name: Fire Brigade House
purpose: Crew hall with pumps, carts, and cistern taps
notes: Houses trained crews and equipment

name: Maintenance Shed
purpose: Holds tools for field repairs and patching
notes: Basic upkeep on roads and fences

name: Maintenance Workshop
purpose: Bench-lined shop for structured upkeep
notes: Improves reliability across structures

name: Well
purpose: Dug well with cap and bucket
notes: Provides local water draw

name: Cistern
purpose: Lined cistern with cover and spouts
notes: Collects runoff; reduces hauling

name: Aqueduct
purpose: Elevated channel bringing water from source
notes: Requires maintenance crews and watch

name: Open Drainage
purpose: Shallow open drains to move runoff
notes: Reduces standing water but visible

name: Covered Drains
purpose: Boarded or stone-covered drains
notes: Safer streets, reduced odor

name: Stone Sewers
purpose: Vaulted stone sewers with maintenance hatches
notes: Needs inspection crews; keeps streets clean

name: Cold Hooks
purpose: Hanging hooks for chilled storage and aging
notes: Requires cold storage or winter ice to keep temperatures low

name: Crane & Hoist (Wharf)
purpose: Small crane and hoist for waterfront unloading
notes: Improves turnaround for boats and barges

name: Repair Shed
purpose: Covered shed for maintaining nets and boats
notes: Keeps crews working in foul weather

name: Salting House
purpose: Dedicated salting room and racks for fish curing
notes: Reduces spoilage across large catches

name: Cold Storage Annex
purpose: Cold pit or chilled cellar for fishery output
notes: Uses packed ice or runes; slows spoilage

name: Foundry
purpose: Heavy furnace bay for bulk metal casting
notes: Handles larger heats and molds than a smithy
